ctx: Energetika: slovenska obdavčitev presežnih prihodkov na hudo trhlih temeljih
content:
Zadnja sprememba: crt 14.12.2022 19:10
- te nesramne naftne firme samo delajo dobicek in potem sedijo na
njem, namesto da bi investirale v nove kapacitete in olajsale
krizo!

- UK-based bank HSBC said today it will stop providing finance for
new oil and gas fields & will subject prospective clients in
the sector to criteria around exploration & production &
the energy transition

mislim, ne gre oboje hkrati - in vec in manj "esg nezazelene"
proizvodnje...

tam cez vodo danes neki pozitivni prebliski:

US Energy Secretary Jennifer Granholm extended an olive branch to
the oil and gas industry, telling executives that she recognizes
fossil fuels will be around for a long time
